body.name: ALDRICH 18 Inch Metal King Size Bed Frame - Black Basic Steel Slats Platform, Easy Assembly Heavy Duty Noise Free Bedframes, No Box Spring Needed
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 17 mins
features: ASSEMBLY DIMENSION - The bed frame king size: 75.6" x 79.6", Suitable Mattress: 76" x 80". Maximum weight capacity of this king size platform bed frame: 3000 lbs. There is 16 inches from the floor, which provides enough space for storing boxes, clothes, toys, quilts, etc.

NOISE ELIMINATION - No Box spring needed for the metal king bedframe. Rubber cushion of the metal bed frames king size is good for noise elimination, Every bed legs designed with non-scratch gaskets to protect your fancy floor and provides you with a peaceful sleep.

SIMPLE STYLE - The king size metal bed frame is completely simple style. This black platform king bed frame is the prefect choice for residence bedroom, guest rooms, dormitories, apartments and short visiting families or friends.

STURDY MATERIAL - Because we have chosen the high-quality materials, this metal black king metal bed frame is quite durable and solid. Unlike other beds, this black king size bedframe has 9 thicken legs, which has the extra strong support. We believe once you get this bed king size frame, you will like it.

EASY ASSEMBLE - Easy to assemble heavy king sized bed frame, with clear step-by-step instructions to help you easily assemble. The bed frame king size no box spring needed is placed in a box. All parts of metal sturdy bed frame are labeled clearly, which is easy to assemble, and can be assembled by one person within 20 minutes.

King Bed Frame No Box Spring Needed Easy Assembly: The package include all required hardwares and a clear assembly instructions to help you install this metal bed frame in few minutes.Headboard and Footboard Reserved Holes: You can DIY your own standard-sized headboard and footboard for this metal platform by using the reserved holes.Ample Storage Space: This metal bed frame with ample under bed storage to store more debris, more easy to clean, and makes your room look more cleaner and tidier.

Why choose Aldrich bed frames? Aldrich is a professional manufacturer of metal bed frames over 10 years. We committed to provide our customers the high quality products with most competitive prices. Will it take a lot of time to assemble your bed frames? Our product is super easy to assemble, with our clear step by step instructions, you can put our bed frames together within 20 minutes. All the hardware and bed frame parts are clearly labelled in the box. Can I attach a headboard or a footboard to your bed frame? Yes. You can DIY your own standard-sized headboard and footboard for this metal bed frame by using the 3 reserved holes on the front and back legs. Do you have the plastic floor protectors on the bottom of metal legs? Yes, all our bed frame legs have pre-assembled with plastic inserts to protect your beautiful and fancy floors. Most importantly, it's noise free and will bring you a quiet and comfortable sleep and nice dream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Delivery was quick and the set up took me about 15 minutes (Easy). Simple instructions included. Even had extra nuts and bolts incase something was missing. Everything came in a nice package and no damage or scratches to any of the metal framing. Just need to get a head board and foot board to complete. Holes are already drilled into framing to make mounting them easy. After assembly, the framing was very nice and sturdy. Was no squeaking either but it was only day one. We will see if it does in the future. Simple and Easy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy bed frame
reviews.reviewText: My handyman had a very easy time putting this together. Bedframe is extremely sturdy and I love that it is taller so it can accommodate under bed storage. I also really like that I no longer need a box spring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product at a great price point.
reviews.reviewText: For sub $100, I was worried ordering this product I was going to get an inferior product to something you’d buy at the big box store. Happy to report this bed frame assembled VERY easily, if you have 2 brain cells to rub together and a large enough space, you’ll figure it out. In exchange for the painless setup of this product, you have a bed frame that holds a box spring, mattress, and two adults with ZERO noise, play, etc.5 stars guys!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid frame, well engineered and documented
reviews.reviewText: I put this frame together in about an hour. Instructions were very clear and all parts were marked. It's made of sturdy steel, and the fit and finish is outstanding. (Only some bolt threads were stubborn to tighten.)They even included spare parts! Delivery was very prompt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly What I Needed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this platform to fit inside an existing bed frame where the wood slats had broken. The bed is 12 years old and is part of a very nice wedding gift set. I wanted something to last another 15-20 years, but without more wooden slats that will eventually wear out again. I also wanted to replace the original mattress box springs.I wasn't even sure this platform frame would work, as it's designed to be a stand-alone piece of furniture. But unlike other similar frames where the sizing is approximate, the dimensions are exactly as indicated in the product description and this platform frame fit perfectly.The platform frame itself is good quality and easy to assemble. Just pay attention. I put one of the rails on backwards and to take it back apart. That was a real PITA right after twisting the bolts extra tight so it won't loosen up.I highly recommend that you toss out the little metal wrench included with the hardware package. It's thin and doesn't work very well. If you want a really secure fit use a 15mm socket wrench. It will take you literally seconds to tighten each bolt vs. the frustration of trying to use the wrench.The "non-skid" rails aren't particularly impressive. I didn't trust them to not scratch my wood floor and stuck rubber non-skid grommets on the bottom of each. The frame still moves slightly but won't scratch up the floor.Overall, I'm very satisfied with this purchase and would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid! Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: What else can you want? Simple design. It's is really functional and a great value for the price. Super solid. Super easy to assemble. And is working great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally worth it. Very low profile
reviews.reviewText: Not only was it simple & quick to put together. (Less then 20 mins with a small drill)It's actually really sturdy. I was afraid it would be weak or wobbly. This bed isn't moving any where lol. Totally recommend. I was able to have a king size bed again in this small room with out taken up huge amounts of space with a large king frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install. Some screws didn’t fit well but it worked..no noise or squeaking, frame very sturdy.Will buy again I have the 18’ too high for me but will get the 14’ next time..
